text: I Have created a module for fetching data from the custom object filter by category. I have call the module 9 times on the page but the result shows only five categories of data.
via the api or the app?

do you have a question?

It is showing the data you have and because that query isn’t coming up wiht anything so it isn’t displaying anything. Is it possible you don’t have custom objects with that category?

I’ll also mention that calling out 9 separate calls to the hubdb database for a category change is very inefficient. If it were me, and others can argue here if they’d like, I’d make one call and push them into the different categories. doing 9 individual calls for what you are doing seems expensive, considering the limit is 10. Just because you can make that many calls doens’t mean you should
